name: react-native-media-library
author: Pontus Abrahamsson
description: Provides access to user's media library.

scripts.clean-project: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf ios/Podfile.lock && rm -rf ios/pods && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf android/app/build
